particlesPanel.subtitle: We develop successful solutions for the digital future of our clients.

webDevelopment.title: Web development
webDevelopment.shortText: Flawless website and e-shop is necessary condition for smooth business in a digital world.
webDevelopment.longText: Even a good prosperous company can lose a lot of potencional clients because of outdated and obsolete website. Connect with your future clients by attractive and well arranged web design. Utilize first impression and give your project sex-appeal, colour, flavour, mood etc. It is not sufficient to only have quality appearance. Website should be strong externally (trendy web design) as well as internally (flawless web code).
webDevelopment.longText2:
Responsive website? Of course! We all know that feeling of disappointment when some website does not work properly on our mobile phone or other portable device. This cannot happen to you with us.

We create for you:
  • Modern webpage which connects to a target group
  • Trendy looking e-shop which sells
  • Update for your graphic and code
  • Web optimalization for better SEO (Search Engine Optimization)
  • Reliable custom-made web application
  • Extension of any web section.

designStudio.title: Design studio
designStudio.shortText: Appearance is always first thing we perceive. Utilize it and interest with attractive and tasteful visual design.
designStudio.longText:
Quality product is not enough, your product have to be good looking and better than the products of the rival companies. Our design studio gives you brilliant appearance which amaze your clients.

Corporate identity:
Build up your company with unified graphic style which will represent your visions and ideas.

  • So, you already have such a graphic style but you want some improvements? Great, we will update look of your product but keep original core.
  • Are you unsatisfied with current outdated design? We will design entirely new sexy visual style for you.
Logo:
Somebody might say that logo is minor thing but for succesfull businessman it is important brand element. Everyone want to have original and easy memorable logo but not everyone has it. We know how to impress people by original and trendy logotype.
designStudio.longText2:
Promotion:
Billboards, roll-up banners, clothes printing, car pasting, citylights etc. We design for you everything you can utilize during public promotion.

Website design:
Do not lose potential clients because of outdated and poorly arranged website. Be in advance with modern design which we will make for you.

Printed materials:
Do you need design of business card, magazine, invintation card, product catalog or corporate prospectus? You are on right place. We arrange everything, printing included.

socialMedia.title: Social networks
socialMedia.shortText: Who use social networks is visible. Do you want to be visible?
socialMedia.longText:
In complex corporate marketing it is necessary to promote yourself in every place with high amount of people. Nowadays, no one can waste potential of social networks as a promoting medium.

Social networks are good tools for self-reflection and market research. Find out what people think a use it for your business.

We will make for you social network profile corresponding with your corporate identity and your target group. We will choose adequate website as: Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube, Pinterest, LinkedIn etc.
socialMedia.longText2:
1. Build up good relations with people: Existing plan is not enough, you will need communication plan which will reflect your marketing strategy and corporate identity. We will administrate your profile effectively and presentably.

  2. Improve your sales skills with us: If you want to administrate your profile on your own, we respect it. Despite it, we can help you with communication plan and productive marketing.

appDevelopment.title: App development
appDevelopment.shortText: We make modern and realiable applications exactly according to your needs and ideas
appDevelopment.longText:
We create progressive web (PWA), native (NA) and hybrid applications.

Windows, Linux, Android or iOS? Choose suitable platform, we will make the rest.

Our applications will make your and your clients life easier and save a lot of time.

We guarantee flawless app running and permanent support.
appDevelopment.longText2:
Do you have semi-finished or already running app? We will help you as an innovative tool and upgrade you app to version 2.0.

Decent app does not work without good marketing due to huge competition. Let us to promote your app to clients. Be succesful and get only positive reference.

corporateIdentity.title: Corporate identity
corporateIdentity.shortText: Coherent and elaborated attitude is the key to confident corporate behaviour.
corporateIdentity.longText:
Corporate identity should be based on three connected foundations: culture, communication and design.

Corporate culture.
The most abstract part. You have to formulate and clarify what is basis of your business, what is your goal. who are your clients and what is your uniqueness. All these things are neccesary to flawless communication and graphics of your project.

Communication.
Bridge between you and the rest of the world. Every age and social group need specific attitude and prefer specific communication media. We will create appropriate communication strategy for your future clients. Your product will get positive response.
corporateIdentity.longText2:
Graphic design.
The most visible part of the corporate identity. Together with communication, graphic design directly affect client´s idea of your company. According to corporate identity we will create entire graphic web design, unique logotype and also additional promo material. You cannot attract people without smart design.

Which one of the foundations do you want?

offlineMarketing.title: Offline marketing
offlineMarketing.shortText: When the online promotion is not enough.
offlineMarketing.longText:
However, today´s digital age incline more likely to online promotion, one cannot fully neglect older offline format.

Practice as well as statistics clearly show us that online and offline marketing must go hand in hand in successful business. The both types of marketing should be connected to achieve the corporate identity. Finding of this connection is not trivial, but we know how to do it.

It does not matter what promoting medium you choose. We will create good-looking and clear design which will correspond with your corporate identity.
offlineMarketing.longText2:
We create:

  • Business cards
  • Offline media
  • Flyers, posters, car pastings
  • Materials for expos and events
  • Billboards
  • Ambient marketing

onlineStaffTraining.title: Online staff training
onlineStaffTraining.shortText: Educate yourself or your employees right from your comfy chair.
onlineStaffTraining.longText:
Use opportunity of comfort long-distance training course. Due to modern advancement, you can save your time and money which you normally spend for transport, lectors and technical manipulation.

We will provide for you complete custom-made e-learning courses or training courses via online sessions in any platform (Skype, Discord, MS Teams etc.).
onlineStaffTraining.longText2:
Quality guarantee: A teacher of every training course will be competent and skilled person.

Testing of acquired knowledge: Every training ends with control testing which proves participants improvements.

Individual approach: Choose your time schedule, framework and specific content. Training should be designed for your work improvement, not for limiting your professional and personal life.

Participation: Participate on final form of online training courses according your preferences and knowledge of your employees.

hrMarketing.title: HR marketing
hrMarketing.shortText: The best way how to attract and keep your employees.
hrMarketing.longText:
There is no doubt that prospering and stable company need to have competent and happy employees. External personnel strategy is the best tool for recruiting new qualified employees, internal personnel strategy is, in the other hand, the best tool for keeping current employees and for improving teamwork.

External HR marketing
Become that company which has not a problem with recruiting new promising people. In short time you will recruit enough superb people due to our HR propagation. You will avoid endless and fruitless job advertising which cost your time and money.
hrMarketing.longText2:
Internal HR marketing
Build up an aura of successful and attractive place inside your company. Convince your employees that you are better than rival companies using internal personnel marketing. Show your employees that their work is meaningful and has long-term perspective. Contented employee is basic premise for satisfied client as well as for satisfied company.

analysis.title: Market analysis
analysis.shortText: Detect deficiency and find a solution.
analysis.longText:
In every complex procedure one can find problematic factors which interfere with this procedure. If you want to find these factors you need specific analytical knowledge. We have the knowledge and we are ready to solve every of your corporate deficiencies.

Analysis of corporate culture is the key to detect deficiency, though each corporate has its own specific problems. The analysis is based on function of essential employees, inter-corporate processes, relations, rules and values.
analysis.longText2:
We will elaborate the best possible custom-made strategy based on the analysis. You can potentially modify the strategy throughout its application in practice.

Process schedule:

  1. Definition of status quo
  2. Atrengths and weaknesses analysis, detection of interfere factors
  3. Strategy project for improving work procedures
  4. Checking of applied improvements

animations.title: Animations
animations.shortText: Give motion to your projects and ideas.
animations.longText:
Static graphics is obsolete. Promote yourself and your projects by dynamic presentation, video or animated design. Be dynamic, be trendy.

Corporate promo. Show essence of your company via video summary. Visual promo is better than a thousand words. Your clients don´t want to read boring text.

Logo. Don´t let your logotype be static. Use logo as natural part of every promo opening.

YouTube advertisement. Still great and striking way of promotion. Catch client attention by effective short video.
animations.longText2:
Facebook video. One of the most popular social network for sponsored content. Connect your marketing with meaningful video content which will be seen.

TV commercial. Do you want to be seen in TV? Great. We create for you commercial which amaze even your rival companies.

Animated presentation. Be the most popular speaker via your rhetorics but also via your graphics.

Video banner.. Your online banner could be accurate but still too static. Let the dynamic banner speak to your clients.

photo.title: Photo / video
photo.shortText: Record everything important with us and show it to the others.
photo.longText:
We will make for you first-rate video record for business or private purposes.

We will make for you first-rate video record for business or private purposes.

The entire editing (formatting, interconnection with the corporate graphics, design of a photo album, making company promovideo and commercial etc.) is matter of course.
photo.longText2:
Photo: business, product, advertisement, reportage, food style, wedding, family, portrait etc.

Video: advertisement, promotional, product, documentary or even short film.

We will make the photos and the records you wish and than provide you the edited final product. Just tell us where and when.

cloud.title: Cloud solutions
cloud.shortText: Keep your data on the safe place and available whenever you need.
cloud.longText:
Managing and manipulating data via cloud storages is common in every succesful company. Cloud solution saves costs of hardware, software and IT support.

Work effectiveness is increased due to remote access to all data. Anything can be quickly found, checked and tracked. Workflow of your team is upgraded to another level.

Security: All of your data in cloud are safely stored. If you use external storage you automatically reduce risk of hacking or overloading. You do not need to waste your time with data backup because cloud systems do it automatically. You cannot lost any of your data, we can restore them immediately.
cloud.longText2:
Bespoke cloud: One of the many advantages of cloud is the fact that you pay only what you use. Unlike the flat rate service you can choose how much productive power and data capacity you want to have at your disposal. You can specify everything according to your needs.

Simplicity is the key: You do not need to study MIT for using cloud software. Common user can very quickly adapt to cloud interface and work more efficiently.

step1.title: First steps
step1.subtext: The first step must be taken by You. You must have at least a rough idea of what you want and why you want it. Once you've thought this through, get in touch so we can arrange an appointment.

step2.title: Brainstorming
step2.subtext: We'll meet up and discuss how we should go about making your project to ensure we work efficiently and accurately. We'll work your ideas through current market needs and develop an optimal design. You always have the final world, of course.

step3.title: Execution
step3.subtext: Once You approve our finalized design, we'll give it to our people, who'll make sure its execution is as proper and swift as possible. Nothing gets rushed - every one of our projects is polished to perfection.

step4.title: Delivery
step4.subtext: The big moment - You'll receive exactly what You ordered from us. A happy customer is the greatest motivation for the making of future projects.

step+.title: Service / update
step+.subtext: Project delivery isn't the end of our cooperation - we'll stay in touch if you ever need us for any reason. Squash a bug? Add a feature? Let us know whatever is on your mind.

0.title: Let's go low-cost
0.subtext: We get it, you're a small company or an individual with limited budget. Everyone must start somewhere and we've got your back.

25.title: More for less
25.subtext: You've got a very realistic budget, we have a project for you that you're going to be proud of.

50.title: More than standard
50.subtext: With this capital, we can give you a striking project for a striking price (in a good way).

75.title: Money isn't a problem
75.subtext: Evidently, you're in the big leagues where complex yet robust solutions matter most. This is where we excel.

100.title: I'm in Forbes 400
100.subtext: We're talking about a world-class project here. We'll do everything to make sure you get only the best. Also, tell Elon we said hi!
